short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun snake game extension with an advanced customization system and power ups!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snake Game - Classic Fun with Modern Twists!

Relive the timeless fun of the classic Snake game, now with a sleek, customizable interface and exciting power-ups! Whether you're taking a quick break or looking for a nostalgic challenge, this extension brings hours of fun directly to your browser.

Why install this Snake Game?
- Simple and Addictive Gameplay: Easy to pick up, but hard to master!
- Customizable: Personalize the snake, food, and background colors to match your style.
- Exciting Power-Ups: Speed up your snake, earn extra points, and challenge your reflexes.
- No Internet Required: Play anytime, anywhere right in your browser.
- Lightweight: It won't slow down your browsing experience.
- Perfect for when you need a fun distraction or a challenge!

Download now and see how high you can score.
